# EmailKits

> Beautiful email templates in minutes. No code, no subscriptions.

EmailKits is a self-serve email template builder. Pick a template, fill in your content through a simple form, and download production-ready HTML email code.

## What it does
- Form-based email template builder (no drag-and-drop, no code)
- Outputs clean HTML email code tested across 60+ email clients
- Works with Mailchimp, ConvertKit, Beehiiv, Buttondown, SendGrid, and any platform that accepts custom HTML
- Templates: newsletters, welcome sequences, product launches, digests, announcements, minimal layouts

## Pricing
- Single: $19 (one template, commercial use)
- Bundle: $29 (all templates + future updates, commercial use)
- Agency: $39 (everything + client-use license, priority support)
- All tiers are one-time purchases. No subscriptions.

## Target audience
Creators, startups, marketers, indie businesses, newsletter writers, solopreneurs

- Website: https://emailkits.com
- Related: https://htmldecks.com (presentation templates)
